extension_desc.message: Limiting the number of tabs opened at the same time in a single window.

warning_msg.message: The number of tabs in the current window is above the specified tab-limit

max_tabs_allowed.message: Maximum number of tabs allowed in each window

count_pinned_tabs.message: Count pinned tabs in tab limit

close_least_recentlyActive.message: Close the least recently active tab

close_least_recentlyUpdated.message: Close the least recently updated tab

close_least_timesActivated.message: Close the tab that has been active the least number of times

close_oldest_tab.message: Close the tab that has been opened for longest

prevent_newTab.message: Prevent a new tab from being opened

show_notifications.message: Show notification when opening too many tabs

max_tabs_must_be_integer.message: Maximum number of tabs most be a positive integer
